titleStmt.title: The great concern and zeal of a loyal people for a good king's preservation in the hazards of war. And the duty of such a people opened and enforced, in one of our monthly-fasts in a country parish. By the minister thereof.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Jonathan Robinson, at the Golden-Lion in St. Paul's Church-Yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
